item.description:
LIMITED TO 100 OF THE FINEST SINGLE PROFESSIONALS IN THE BOSTON AREA.

Successful. Confident. President of a company.
Owner of a professional practice. Media celebrity.
Self-employed professional. Sports professional.

Doctors, lawyers, business owners, corporate presidents,
senior-level management and administrators
and consultants from various fields are some of the
members of this very, very select group of single CEO’s.

PEOPLE YOU WILL NOT MEET ANY OTHER WAY.

DRESS TO IMPRESS...this could be the finest event you'll ever attend.

www.singleceos.com
_______________________________________________________________________
I’d like to invite you to our February ‘MEET & GREET’ cocktail party to be held on February 10th at Pier 4 Restaurant, Boston, 5:30 to 7:30 PM. Complimentary hors d’oeuvres and a cash bar. Please fill out the following form and return it to:

THE SINGLE CEO’S CLUB, 580 Salem St., Ste. 32, Wakefield, MA 01880. (Upon receipt, a formal invitation will be sent.)

Attendance is limited to the first 100 who register.

PROPER BUSINESS – COCKTAIL ATTIRE REQUIRED.
Ties and jackets for men absolutely required.

NOTE: This is a one-time cursory invitation; you may not attend another event without being a member. You’re invited to check it out.
_______________________________________________________________________

Cocktails, hors d'oeuvres, cash bar sets the pace of the evening. The rest is up to you.

TIES & JACKETS ABSOLUTELY REQUIRED FOR MEN AND BUSINESS ATTIRE OR PARTY FINERY FOR WOMEN.


[center]"MEET & GREET"[/center]


You must submit a personal profile provided on the site or call 617-721-9655 to have one mailed.

Bring a face full of smiles, a positive attitude, and the evening will be yours.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the door as a greeter.
item.name: THE SINGLE CEO'S CLUB February Meetup
